channel.title: All About Everything
channel.subtitle: A show about everything
channel.author: John Doe
channel.summary: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into any subject known to man and talk about it as much as we can. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Store
channel.description: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into any subject known to man and talk about it as much as we can. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Store

items.title: Shake Shake Shake Your Spices
items.author: John Doe
items.subtitle: A short primer on table spices
items.summary: This week we talk about salt and pepper shakers, comparing and contrasting pour rates, construction materials, and overall aesthetics. Come and join the party!

items.title: Socket Wrench Shootout
items.author: Jane Doe
items.subtitle: Comparing socket wrenches is fun!
items.summary: This week we talk about metric vs. old english socket wrenches. Which one is better? Do you really need both? Get all of your answers here.

items.title: Red, Whine, & Blue
items.author: Various
items.subtitle: Red + Blue != Purple
items.summary: This week we talk about surviving in a Red state if you are a Blue person. Or vice versa.
